-spec find_maximum_length(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
find_maximum_length(Nums) ->
    find_maximum_length(Nums, 0, [], 0).

find_maximum_length([], MaxLen, _, CurrentLen) ->
    max(MaxLen, CurrentLen);
find_maximum_length([H | T], MaxLen, [], 0) ->
    find_maximum_length(T, MaxLen, [H], 1);
find_maximum_length([H | T], MaxLen, [Prev | _] = Acc, CurrentLen) when H >= Prev ->
    find_maximum_length(T, MaxLen, [H | Acc], CurrentLen + 1);
find_maximum_length([_H | T], MaxLen, _Acc, CurrentLen) ->
    NewMax = max(MaxLen, CurrentLen),
    find_maximum_length(T, NewMax, [], 0).
